casebody.data:
THE SOUTHERN CROSS. THE SOCONY NO. 4. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 6, 1927. No. 312.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Paul Speer, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. William E. Purdy, of New York City, for appellee. PER CURIAM.

Decree (21 E.[2d] 75) affirmed, with costs.
